title: Merle Norman
content:
Can someone please ID MN font? Danka

http://www.merlenorman.com/images/04%20merle%20norman%20(BLK).gif

 [‹ Help needed please](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121223050/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37477 "Go to previous forum topic") [any ideas ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121223050/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37468 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zzi

comments.content:
It’s probably a custom design since it’s a logo. However, the ’O’ and ’R’ bear similarities to Futura. If you flipped the ’U’ in Futura upside-down, you could get close to the ’N’, and adding a crossbar would get you the ’A’. A lot of other tweaking would be needed as well, but it could serve as a starting point.

- Lex
